record.description: Trustees of the University of Chicago tossed a party recently for the faculty and their wives. Chicago Life's candid camera captured the invited guests having a gay time, proving that the caricature of the professor as stodgy or absent-minded is as out of date as a handlebar mustache. Mrs. Albert Crewe, wife of the assistant professor of physics at the Enrico Fermi Institute during conversation with a university faculty member.
